tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
quoteText:
Ad networks and exchanges operated by authorized third parties for interest-based advertising

We may use third parties, such as advertising networks and exchanges, to allow us to serve you advertisements. These third-party ad networks and exchange providers may use third-party cookies, web beacons, or similar technologies to collect information about your visit to our site and elsewhere on the Internet.
